data.message: Why aren't you moving away from plastics to a more sustainable source instead of using plastic, which just perpetuates the cycle! Why arent starch based polymers being promoted instead?

replies.message: Hi Ben, we’re working hard to ensure our packaging is as sustainable as possible. Plastic has lots of benefits and is fully recyclable. It’s much lighter and uses less material than glass. It also can’t get broken easily so it’s safer. As long as it’s responsibly disposed of, it can be recycled and reused into other packaging or fibre. we’ve also been researching and creating alternatives to oil based plastics, such as our PlantBottle™, which is the first-ever recyclable plastic bottle made from plants. We use the PlantBottle for all of our Honest Tea and Smartwater range here in Great Britain and are always looking at ways that we can expand its use across our portfolio.
